meanings.sent1: After the puppies grew up, the dog owners decided to rebreed them.

meanings.sent4: The idea to rebreed the roses in the garden sparked a burst of colorful blooms.
meanings.sent5: In order to increase the population, the conservationists needed to rebreed the endangered species.
